body: Yeah, the Taskcluster failure is a known intermittent, tracked in #757. There isn't any way to restart a TC build, you have to either push something new (I prefer `git commit --amend; git push --force-with-lease`) or close and re-open the PR.
body_text: Yeah, the Taskcluster failure is a known intermittent, tracked in #757. There isn't any way to restart a TC build, you have to either push something new (I prefer git commit --amend; git push --force-with-lease) or close and re-open the PR.
body_html: Yeah, the Taskcluster failure is a known intermittent, tracked in #757. There isn't any way to restart a TC build, you have to either push something new (I prefer git commit --amend; git push --force-with-lease) or close and re-open the PR.
